Es muy reconocida en la zona donde habita ya que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, responsable y sobre todo honesta. Muchas personas prefieren sus productos ya que ofrece variedad, calidad y buenos precios. Este negocio es muy importante para ella  ya que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos,  esto lo impulsa a estar muy atenta y muy pendiente del rumbo de su negocio, es decir, siempre está un paso adelante  de la competencia de tal forma que su negocio pueda llegar a ser el líder en tiendas  en la zona donde habita. Todo esto lo ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tienda en la  compra de variedad de productos de tienda como: aceite, frijoles, arroz,  leche,  golosinas, azúcar, papel y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes,  de tal forma de que  estos siempre encuentren lo que buscan y estén satisfechos con su servicio. De esta manera espera vender más productos y   mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Marina, 37, lives in her own house with her family, made up of her husband and children.  She makes a living with a store located in her home, which she has set up to draw the attention of her customers.  She's very well known in the area where she lives because she's known for being very hardworking, responsible, and above all honest.  A lot of people prefer her products because she has variety, quality, and good prices.

This business is very important for her because it's one of her main sources of income.  This motivates her to be attentive and responsive to the direction her business is taking.  In other words, she always stays one step ahead of the competition so her business can become the leader of the stores in the area where she lives.

All this has brought her to make the decision to ask Integral for a loan to invest in her store by buying a variety of products such as oil, beans, rice, milk, sweets, sugar, paper, and other items.

She wants to attract more customers who will always find what they're looking for and be satisfied with her service.  This way she hopes to sell more products and improve her income, which will allow her to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of store products

loans.name: Ester

texts.es: Ester de 55 años de edad vive junto a su familia su esposo y su hijo es una mujer muy emprendedora que jamás se ha dejado vender por las adversidades de la vida. Es muy responsable con sus que haceres del hogar como con la vida cotidiana. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee un pequeño puesto de verduras y frutas en el mercado central donde reside junto a su esposo cada mañana se levantan con nuevas ilusiones todas por brindarle lo mejor a su hijo y que este el día de mañana se los agradezcan. Ester desea incrementar su venta ya que se próxima una temporada alta y no tiene los recursos para llevar a cabo tal acción es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar mas verduras como: pepinos, tomates, chile verde, cebollas, zanahoria entre otras. Espera que las bendiciones sean dadas y cumplir su sueño ya que para ella es muy importante porque esta es su única fuente de ingreso económicos.
texts.en: Ester is 55 years old, she lives with her family composed of her husband and her son. She is a very resourceful woman who has never allowed life adversities to heave the best of her. She is very responsible both with her household chores and in her daily life. With efforts and determination she runs a small fruits and vegetables stall in the central market of her community. She and her husband get up every morning with renewed confidence, working to grant the best to their child and hoping that he will be grateful to them in the future. Ester wishes to increase her sales with the approaching of a very good season, but she does not have enough money to invest in her project, and for this reason she has come to INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that she will use to buy more vegetables such as cucumbers, tomatoes, green chili peppers, onions and carrots. She hopes to be blessed and to succeed in achieving her drams: it is very important for her as this is her only source of economic income.

loans.use: To buy cucumbers, tomatoes, green chili peppers, onions and carrots.

loans.name: Ubaydullo

texts.ru: Убайдулло житель города Дангара. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Убайдулло домохозяйка. Убайдулло открыл небольшую столовую, где работает поваром. Поваром он работает тридцать один год. Убайдулло берет кредит для ремонта столовой и приобретения мебели, а также для покупки продуктов.
texts.en:
Ubaydullo is a resident of the city of Dangara. He is 54 years old and married. He has three children. Ubaydullo's wife is a housewife. 

Ubaydullo has opened a small cafeteria, where he works as a cook. He has worked as a cook for 31 years. Ubaydullo takes a loan for repairing the cafeteria and purchase furniture, and further to purchase products.

loans.use: to repair his cafeteria and to purchase furniture, and further to purchase products.

loans.name: Germán Dario

texts.es: Germán Darío de 46 años de edad, es un hombre que se  ha caracterizado por ser un luchador y enfrentarse a cualquier reto que la vida le ponga. Tras haberse quedado sin empleo se vio en la necesidad de rebuscarse el pan de cada día, decidió dedicarse a la venta de ropa y accesorios de plata a sus amigos y familiares. Hoy visiona su negocio más grande, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una motocicleta que le permita desplazarse a lugares más retirados con el fin de ampliar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento del hogar. Su gran sueño es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en: Germán Darío, 46, is a man characterized by being a fighter and confronting any challenge life gives him. After being left unemployed, he was forced to look for a new way to make his daily bread. He decided to sell clothing and silver accessories to his family and friends. Currently he envisions an expanding business and is requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle to take him to areas located further away in order to increase sales and generate more income for his household. His big dream is to improve his quality of life and offer his family a better economic situation.

loans.use: buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Azamkhon

texts.ru: Азамхон проживает в районе Дангара. Он женат. Ему 46 лет. У него четверо детей. Азамхон более одиннадцати лет занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин со смешанным ассортиментом товара. Азамхон берет кредит для покупки продуктов.
texts.en:
Azamkhon lives in the Dangara region. He is married and 46 years old. He has four children. Azamkhon has been working with sales for more than 11 years. He has a store with a mixed assortment of products. 

Azamkhon takes a loan for the purchase of products.

loans.use: to purchase products for his store

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La señora María tiene 44 años está casada con el señor Gregorio, tienen 3 hijos de los cuales 1 de sus hijas ya es independiente y el hijo menor está estudiando en la universidad. Lastimosamente la señora Maira y su esposo están separados, ya que el señor Gregorio se encuentra en la republica de la Argentina trabajando, tuvo que inmigrar a otro país por necesidad económica, son una familia de escasos recursos económicos que hasta hace 3 años no tienen una casa donde vivir, Vivian todos en dos cuartos en alquiler, donde estaban muy incomodos, pero gracias al trabajo del señor Gregorio y de la señora María lograron comprarse un terreno donde poco a poco construyeron. La señora maría trabaja en un hospital público como cocinera  y además cuentan con un minibús  para realizar transporte de pasajeros, esta actividad representa un ingreso adicional ya que el sueldo de la señora María es muy bajo. Por lo tanto el destino del crédito es para la compra de gas natural para que de esa manera pueda ahorrarse en combustible, ya que si trabaja con Gasolina ya no le queda mucha utilidad. Entre sus sueños y mentas de la señora María es que pronto vuelva su marido de Argentina que  pueda estar junto, y lo más importante es que su hijo termine la carrera profesional que está estudiando.
texts.en: María is 44 years old, she is married with Gregorio and they have 3 children: 1 of their daughters is economically independent, while their youngest son is attending university. Unfortunately, María and her husband are apart from each other because Gregorio is currently living and working in Argentina: he has had to emigrate to another country for economic reasons. They are not a wealthy family and up to 3 years ago they did not have a place to live; they were living in two rented rooms and the were not very comfortable, but thanks to Gregorio and María’s work they have succeeded in buying some land on which they have been building a house little by little. María is a cook in a public hospital, and on top of this they have a minibus with which they provide passenger services. This second activity represents an extra income as María wage is very low. For this reason, the loan she is requesting will be used to change the operating system of her vehicle from gasoline to natural gas in order to save some money, as using gasoline is not economically good for her. Two of María’s most important dreams and goals are that her husband comes back from Argentina as soon as possible, so that they can be together again, and that her son finishes his professional studies.

loans.use: To buy a natural gas operating system for her vehicle.

loans.name: Lalahan

texts.ru: Лалахан 52 года, вдова, имеет дочь и сына. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Лалахан начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с 1,000 сом (KGS) 30 лет назад хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Лалахан , ее хозяйство насчитывает 4 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Лалахан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Лалахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнес за счет увеличения поголовья скота. В будущем планирует женить сына и выдать замуж дочку.
texts.en:
Lalahan is 52 years old, a widow, and she has a daughter and a son. In search of a source of income for the family, Lalahan started working with livestock breeding. Having started with 1,000 som (KGS) 30 years ago, the farm today brings in around 10,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of dairy products. Thanks to the persistent work of Lalahan, her farm today counts four dairy cows and one horse. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Lalahan turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of livestock. Lalahan plans to invest the income in further growing her business through increasing the number of livestock. In the future she plans to get her son and daughter married.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tolib

texts.ru: Толиб проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Толиб хороший и ответственный молодой человек. Он намерен предоставлять услугу по маршруту Душанбе - Вахдат. Толиб берет кредит для приобретения автомашины, чтобы предоставлять услугу, такси. Он очень надеется на Вас!
texts.en: Tolib lives in the town of Vahdat. He is 35 years old, married and has two children. Tolib is a good and responsible young man. He plans to provide a service on route from Dushanbe to Vahdat. Tolib is taking out the loan to purchase a vehicle so he can provide the taxi service. He is very hopeful for your help!

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

loans.name: Nazarali

texts.ru: Назарали проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Назарали занимается торговлей. Он открыл небольшой продуктовый магазин. Торговлей он занимается четыре года. Назарали берет кредит для покупки продуктов с целью увеличения оборота.
texts.en: Nazarali lives in the town of Vahdat. He is 56 years old, married and has six children. Nazarali is in sales. He opened a small grocery store. He has been selling groceries for four years. Nazarali is taking out the loan to buy groceries with a goal to increase sales.

loans.use: to purchase groceries with a goal to increase sales.

loans.name: Aygul

texts.ru: Айгуль 44 года, замужем, имеет трех сыновей. Старший сын работает на рынке грузчиком, младшие на иждивение. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Айгуль начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Начатое с с земли выделенной государством после распада СССР, хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 15,000-20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от животноводства и полеводства. Благодаря упорному труду Айгуль , ее хозяйство насчитывает 3 дойные коровы, 2 лошади и 14 голов овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айгуль обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку кобыл. Доходы Айгуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнес за счет увеличения поголовья скота. В её планах достроить дом.
texts.en:
Aygul is 44 years old, married and has three children. Her oldest son works as a loader at the market, the younger are her dependents. In search of a source of income for the family, Aygul started working with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation. Having started with the land given by the state after the collapse of the Soviet Union, the farm today brings in around 15,000-20,000 som (KGS) per month from the livestock breeding and field crop cultivation. Thanks to Aygul's persistent work, her farm today counts three dairy cows, two horses and 14 sheep. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Aygul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of mares. Aygul plans to invest the income in further growing the business through increasing the number of livestock. She plans to build a house  in the future.

loans.use: to purchase mares

loans.name: Fayzimo

texts.ru: Файзимо проживает в городе Дангара. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Файзимо имеет среднее образование. Она работает на рынке. У Файзимо торговая точка, где она продает фрукты и овощи. Этим видом бизнеса она занимается восемь лет. Файзимо берет кредит для покупки зимних фруктов.
texts.en: Fayzimo lives in the town of Dangara. She is 47 years old, married and has four children. Fayzimo has secondary education. She works on the market. Fayzimo has a vendor location where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been in this business for eight years. Fayzimo is taking out the loan to buy winter fruits.

loans.use: to buy winter fruits.

loans.name: Lutfullo

texts.ru: Лутфулло житель города Вахдат. Ему 33 года. Он женат. Лутфулло является отцом троих детей. Он хочет заняться своим бизнесом. Лутфулло берет кредит для закупа двух телят, одного бычка и дойной коровы, чтобы начать свою деятельность. В этой области Лутфулло имеет богатый опыт. Он с детства присматривал за скотом.
texts.en: Lutfullo lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is 33 years old.  He is married.  Lutfullo is the father of three children.  He would like to start his own business.  Lutfullo is taking out a loan to purchase two calves, one bull and a dairy cow in order to start his business.  Lutfullo has a lot of experience in this sphere.  He has been taking care of livestock since his childhood.

loans.use: to purchase two calves, one bull and a dairy cow

loans.name: Muhiddin

texts.ru: Мухиддин житель города Вахдат. Он 47 - летний женатый мужчина. У него пятеро детей. Мухиддин намерен открыть собственную столовую. Он берет кредит для приобретения в аренду помещения и покупки мебели, посуды, продуктов.
texts.en: Muhiddin lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is a 47 year old, married man.  He has five children.  Muhiddin is determined to open a private cafeteria.  He is taking out a loan for rent and the purchase of furniture, dishes, food items.

loans.use: to rent a location and purchase furniture, dishes and food

loans.name: Gloria Rubiela

texts.es: Gloria de 53 años de edad es una mujer a la que la vida le ha arrebatado grandes tesoros. Su esposo falleció  y quedó sola con sus dos hijos. Razón por la cual tuvo que tomar determinaciones para buscar la forma de sacarlos adelante. Buscó empleo y se dedicó a trabajar en confección en la empresa Leonisa, posteriormente, por el tiempo que demandaban sus hijos se retiró y comenzó realizando arreglos de ropa a sus vecinas. Hoy es bastante reconocida en el sector donde vive, por lo cual sus ingresos han mejorado mucho. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una máquina recubridora para mejorar su calidad en el servicio. Su mayor sueño es poder montar su taller de confección y ofrecer empleo a muchas personas.
texts.en: Gloria, 53, is a woman from whom life has taken great treasures. Her husband died and she was left alone with their two children. This is why she had to make the determination to find a way to move them forward. She looked for a job and began working in tailoring at the business Leonisa. Later, because of the time required by her children, she quit and started repairing clothing for her neighbors. Today she is pretty well-known in the area where she lives, so her income has increased a lot. She is applying for a loan to buy a coverstitch sewing machine to improve the quality of service. Her greatest dream is to be able to start a sewing shop and hire a lot of people.

loans.use: to buy a coverstitch sewing machine

loans.name: Juan Diego

texts.es: Juan Diego es un joven de 22 años de edad, el cual se ha ganado la admiración y el respeto de su familia, su pujanza y ganas de salir a delante le han permitido alcanzar grandes sueños en la vida. A su corta edad ya logró montar su negocio de comidas rápidas el cual labora los fines de semana. En semana se dedica a la elaboración de buñuelos, pandequesos y pandebonos los cuales distribuye en las cafeterías del municipio de Marinilla, Colombia. Su anhelo en poder montar una panadería en la que pueda crear puestos de empleo. Su mayor motivación es su hijo de un año de edad, con el que sueña poderle ofrecer una buena educación y una excelente calidad de vida. En la actualidad se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito para la compra de un horno digital con el que espera  incrementar y mejorar su producción diaria.
texts.en: Juan Diego is a young man of 22 years of age, who has won the admiration and respect of his family. His drive and desire to get ahead have enabled him to achieve great dreams in life. At his young age, he has succeeded in setting up his own fast-food business, where he works at the weekends. During the week he bakes doughnuts, cheese breads and cheesy maize breads which he distributes to the cafés in the municipality of Marinilla, Colombia. His dearest wish is to be able to start up a bakery where he can create jobs. Juan Diego’s biggest motivation is his one year old son. He dreams of being able to give him a good education and an excellent quality of life. At the moment, Juan Diego is looking for a loan to buy a digital oven, with which he hopes to increase and improve his daily production.

loans.use: to buy a digital oven

loans.name: Juan Norbairo

texts.es: Juan Norbairo de 31 años, ha dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a las labores del campo. Sus tres hijos menores de edad y su esposa, son el motor de su vida. Cada día se levanta muy temprano para realizar las labores de riego y siembra de sus cultivos de zanahoria y papa, en un lote que alquilaron. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará insumos e insecticidas para incrementar la producción de sus cultivos y poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y los ingresos económicos del hogar. Su mayor sueño es poderle comprar a su esposa una vivienda cerca al pueblo, debido a que el terreno se encuentra muy retirado del casco urbano, por lo cual su hijo no ha tenido la oportunidad de ingresas a la escuela.
texts.en: Juan Norbairo is 31 years old and has dedicated the major part of his life to field labor. His three minor children and his spouse are the driving force in his life. Each day he gets up very early to carry out the irrigation labor and sow his carrot and potato crops, in a piece of land that they rented. He is requesting a loan with which he will buy inputs and insecticides to increase the production of his crops and be able to improve the quality of life of his family and the financial income of the home. His major dream is to be able to buy his wife a house near the village, since the terrain is located very far from the built-up area. For this reason his child didn't have the opportunity to start school.

loans.use: to buy inputs and insecticides.

loans.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es: Juan Fernando de 23 años de edad, se ha dedicado desde niño a  la actividad de la ebanistería, oficio que aprendió de su hermano el cual tiene un taller. Trabaja los siete días de  la semana, de 7 de la mañana a 7 de la noche. Con esta actividad el sustenta a su esposa y a su hijo de cuatro años de edad los cuales son su gran tesoro. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirán en la compra de materia prima como telas e insumos para tapicería. Una de las mayores dificultades de este joven es el factor económico, ya que por no haber tenido la oportunidad de estudiar siempre ha laborado en el negocio de su hermano y en ocasiones el taller no le proporciona ni para cubrir las necesidades básicas. Su mayor deseo es tener su propio negocio y posicionarlo en el mercado para mejorar la condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Juan Fernando is 23 years old, and since he was a child he has made a living from woodworking, a job he learned from his brother who has a workshop. He works seven days a week, from 7 in the morning to 7 at night. From this activity, he supports his wife and his 4-year-old son whom are his great treasures. He is requesting a loan that will be invested in the purchase of raw materials like fabric and supplies for upholstery. One of the biggest difficulties for this young man is the economic factor, for not having had the opportunity to study he has always worked in his brother's business. At times, the workshop does not provide enough to cover even his basic necessities. His greatest wish is to have his own business and to put it in the market to improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (fabric)

loans.name: Makhsuda

texts.ru: Махсуда проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Муж Махсуды работает строителем в городе Душанбе. Сама Махсуда хочет заняться своей деятельностью. Она берет кредит для закупа овец и коз, чтобы заняться купле - продажей мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Makhsuda lives in the J.Rumy region of Tajikistan. She's married and a mother to six children. Her husband is a construction worker in Dushanbe. Makhsuda wants to start her own business. She's asking for a loan to purchase some sheep and goats that she intends to resell with profit.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep and goats in order to start selling them for profit.

loans.name: Luis Ángel

texts.es: Luis ángel de 34 años de edad, vive en una vereda de Sonsón municipio del Departamento de Antioquia, Colombia, con su esposa y sus dos hijos menores de edad. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a las labores del campo, actividad que aprendió de su padre. En la actualidad tiene cultivos de café, plátano y caña de azúcar. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos para abonar su cultivo de café. Su mayor desafío ha sido el alto costo de mano de obra que hace que el producto se encarezca y su venta sea muy difícil, lo cual le genera menores rendimientos. Su sueño es poder ofrecerle a su familia una estabilidad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Luis Ángel, 34 years old, lives in a district of the Sonsón municipality in the department of Antioquia, Colombia, with his wife and his two minor children. All of his life he has made a living in agricultural work, a job he learned from his father. Currently his crops are coffee, plantains and sugar cane. He is requesting a loan to buy supplies to fertilize his coffee crop. His greatest challenge has been the high cost of labor which makes the product more expensive and sales difficult, which generates fewer profits. His dream is to be able to offer his family economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies to fertilize his crop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a machine coater (for sewing special stitches).

loans.name: Neang

texts.en:
Neang is shown in the photo where she is weaving bamboo baskets. She does this in addition to the farming business. She is skillful in weaving bamboo containers and objects. She has learned this business from her ancestors. Once a week traders come into the village to collect the finished bamboo products from local entrepreneurs. 

Neang is now 42 of her age and a mother of five children. Neang always strives to move ahead in her business because she wants to move her lifestyle out of the poverty line.

With the amount she has requested through HKL, she plans to invest in purchasing pigs and piglets for raising. She will place her raised pigs separately based on their ages. She will raise female pigs for the purpose of breeding and she will sell the mature male pigs after 4 - 5 months of the raising period. She hopes to be successful in her career and this investment will return her a satisfying income.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing pigs and piglets for raising.

loans.name: Kong

texts.en:
Kong was photographed on the ground of her house located in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is 29 years old and a hardworking farmer who cultivates her land for rice production. Her husband helps her in the business along with her children who are currently studying at a primary state school in the province. Kong has worked in the field for more than 10 years. However, she generates a low income due to the small size of the farmland she owns

Kong is requesting this loan amount in order to pay for the construction of her house which is in progress. She really needs funds to have it finished so that her family will be secured out of the weather factors. She hopes that she will have a suitable house for living. In the future, Kong wishes to own a large farmland where she is capable of making her business more attainable and better the yields.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of her house which is in progress.

loans.name: Yim

texts.en:
Yim is a resident living in Kompong Speu province along with one of her two children. She is a widow, 51, and has been involved in farming for a long time. The main income of her family significantly relies on agriculture and her son who now is working as a paid laborer in Korea; he usually sends a remittance to help Yim every month.

As of now, Yim would like to obtain a microloan of 2,000,000 KHR through HKL to purchase materials for constructing her shelter. Renovating for a suitable living standard is one of her goals to comfortably provide for her family. She would appreciate all generous lenders if the loan will be granted to her to better her living status.

loans.use: to purchase materials for constructing her shelter.

loans.name: Yoem

texts.en:
Yoem, 51, is married and living with his wife and four of his six children in Kompong Speu province. Yoem supports his family’s economy with the income generated from farming. Yoem has been in this occupation for over 30 years and he has his wife as a great business partner. Most of Yoem’s children are currently working to help improve their household income, except for his last-born child.

Yoem is requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle for his three daughters who are employed in a local garment factory. This will help them in their transportation needs, reduce fees, and save time. Yoem is very happy and appreciates the loan help. His dream is to have a big farmland and educate his last-born child up to a higher level.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his three daughters who are employed in a local garment factory.

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch is 45 years old and is married with four children. He is from Kompong Speu province, where he manages and owns a farming business as the main source of his income. He usually does farming in the rainy season and spends the rest of his time working in construction to supplement his income. From the construction industry, Touch is able to generate approximately 5.00 USD a day. One of his children works as a driver to help the family financially.

Touch is looking for a loan in order to purchase a cultivating machine for the maintenance of his rice fields. In addition, he can hire out this machine to local farmers in exchange for money or rice. This will be extra income for him and his family. With the increased revenues, Touch dreams of sending his children to school at least until they graduate from grade 12 level.

loans.use: to purchase a cultivating machine for the maintenance of his rice fields.

loans.name: Rona

texts.en: Rona is 49 years old and married with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rona has a variety store business in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. Rona has been in this business for four years. In the future, Rona would like to save enough money to continue sending her child to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es: Amparo  de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Edgardo y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todos saben que todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al alcance de los clientes; Amparo es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Amparo tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable se siente agradecida con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Amparo, 49, lives in her own house with her life partner, Edgardo, and her children.  She makes a living selling clothing for women, men, and children: shirts, pants, dresses, and skirts, among other things.  She has been in the business for several years, which has given her a lot of experience that allows her to get the best profits.  The business is located in her house and is very well known among people in the area.  She has acquired a lot of customers because everyone knows that everything she sells is high quality and affordably priced.  Her service is incomparable; she's always ready to serve and accessible for her customers.

Amparo's an enterprising woman and a fighter who's devoted to her job.  Every day she makes the maximum effort to earn a better life and great success for herself in the future

Demand went up in the last few weeks and she wants to make the most of it with a new investment.  She doesn't have enough capital to support it, though, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy clothing wholesale.

Amparo has a good payment record and impeccable moral character.  She's grateful for the help.  She's certain she'll be able to repay the debt and she hopes she'll bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale

loans.name: Port

texts.en:
Port, at 61, has spent most of her life dedicated to rice farming with support from her husband, who is 65. Port can earn a decent income to support her living.

This couple was kindly blessed with four children. They all are married and have independent lives around Prey Chor of Kompong Cham province. Port’s last-born child, a daughter, just got married a few weeks ago. Now Port is experiencing financial difficulties in paying the outstanding balance to the wedding's food supplier. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of 100 USD. Port hopes that lenders will help to save her situation by lending her this loan. She is very grateful for the constant help. Responding to the generosity of lenders, she promises to pay her loan back in full.

loans.use: to pay for food costs of her daughter’s wedding.

loans.name: Heng

texts.en:
Heng is a 42-year-old married woman who resides in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She owns a house where she lives with her husband and two children. She and her husband are in the same business of farming. They have been doing this for more than 22 years. Elevating her family out of poverty is the main goal for Heng to resolve in her daily life. She strives to work hard and spends most of her time generating income for the family. She wants to get ahead in managing her businesses, including her grocery store. From her store adjacent to her house, which is open from morning until night, Heng sells a variety of products to people in her neighborhood. This way she can raise more income for her family.

Heng is now requesting a loan of 300 USD from Kiva in order to link public electricity into her house. She believes that her family’s living condition will be improved and she might be able to better control her selling activities at night. In the future, Heng hopes to expand her store and increase her sales.

loans.use: to link public electricity into her house.

loans.name: Luis Esteban

texts.es: Luis Esteban de 52 años de edad, se dedica desde hace 5 años a la cría y engorde de pollos, actividad que heredó de su padre. En la actualidad cuenta con un galpón en el que alberga 350 animales, este oficio se ha convertido en su entrada económica con la cual sostiene a su esposa y a sus dos hijos de 17 y 21 años de edad. Su mayor sueño es poder ingresar a su hijo mayor a la universidad, debido a que ya terminó sus estudios secundarios. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que espera incrementar su capacidad instalada y comprar cuido para terminar de engordar sus pollos y poderlos vender a un mejor precio. Su mayor dificultad han sido las pestes que hacen que muchos pollos se mueran ocasionándole grandes pérdidas.
texts.en: Luis Esteban is 52 years old, and has been breeding and fattening chicken for 5 years, a business that he inherited from his father. Currently he counts on a shed in which he shelters 350 animals. This trade turned into the income with which he sustains his wife and his two children who are 17 and 21 years of age. His major dream is to be able to enrol his oldest son in university, because of the fact that he already finished his secondary school studies. He is requesting a loan with which he hopes to increase his installed capacity and to pay for care in order to finish fattening his chickens and be able to sell them for a better price. His major difficulty has been the plagues that have resulted in many chickens dying and caused great losses for him.

loans.use: to buy chickens for fattening.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 46 years old, married, and the mother of seven children. Four of her children are in school.

Angelina is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She has a business, fish vending, in the Philippines. Angelina requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF, to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Angelina has been in the fish vending business for 30 years. She would like to save money, to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of one child, Carmelita works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from fish vending. Carmelita is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell at her store.

Carmelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF, and more recently from Kiva lenders. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream -- to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell at her store.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a hard-working entrepreneur, who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,500 through NWTF, to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. NWTF is presenting Cristina's business profile again, in support of this new loan and her continued efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Marleny De Jesús

texts.es: Marleny es madre cabeza de familia de dos hijos de 15 y 16 años de edad. La necesidad de esta mujer por sacar sus hijos adelante y llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar, ha sido el motor principal para rebuscarse la vida. Sin pocas oportunidades de empleo debido a la carencia de estudio, doña Marleny decidió dedicarse a la venta por catálogo de ropa interior, pijamas y productos de belleza. Las dificultades económicas por las que atraviesa en estos momentos la han impulsado a solicitar un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de mercancía para incrementar sus ingresos en la temporada navideña. Su mayor deseo es mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y poderles brindar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marleny is a mother and head of a family of two children who are 15 and 16 years of age. This woman's need to get ahead for her children and bring the daily bread to her home has been the driving force for looking for work in her life. With few employment opportunities due to her lack of education, doña Marleny decided to sell underwear, pajamas and beauty products by catalog. The financial difficulties she is going through during this time drove her to request a loan which she will invest in the purchase of merchandise to increase her income during Christmas time. Her major desire is to improve the financial situation of her family and be able to offer her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy underwear, pajamas and beauty products.

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга – из Виноградово. Она уже на пенсии. Однако небольшой суммы, которую она получает в качестве пенсионных выплат (950 гривен), явно не хватает. Поэтому Ольга стала торговать мужской одеждой, в основном рубашками. Торгует она, выезжая в близлежащие сёла. 
Ольге необходима сумма в 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы сделать в двух комнатах своего дома косметический ремонт. В будущем хотела бы еще помочь сыну, который строит дом, финансово.
texts.en:
Olga is from Vinogradovo. She has already retired. However, it a small amount that she receives as pension payments (950 UAH), and clearly not enough. Therefore, Olga started trading men's clothing, mostly shirts. She sells them by going to nearby villages. 

Olga needs an amount of 5,000 UAH to remodel two rooms of her home. In the future, she would like to help her son financially who is building a house.

loans.use: to remodel two rooms of her house.

loans.name: Vann

texts.en:
Vann was photographed at her own house located in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She has appeared to ask for financial assistance from HKL and Kiva. She is a 43-year-old, married woman, and a mother of four children. She is in the same business as her husband, as a farmer. They have been working in this kind of business for almost 30 years. 

Vann is requesting 1,000,000 KHR in order to purchase a stock of rice for consumption by her family. Vann believes that, one day, she will be able to own a wide farmland, on which she will produce more rice to supply her family. She will strive to work harder and gradually develop her business towards her goal.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of rice, for consumption by her family.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Francisca works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines, and earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear clothing.  Francisca is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock of drinking water to sell to customers.

Francisca has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream -- to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of clean drinking water, to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 49 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Jocelyn has a beauty salon business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a loan of 10,000 PHP amount through NWTF to buy new beauty supplies for her beauty salon.

Jocelyn has been in this business for eleven years. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new beauty supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Altai

texts.en:
Altai is 20 years old and lives alone in his wooden house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. His house is located in an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. His parents live and work in the countryside.

Since 2010, Altai has been working as a carpenter for a construction company. He is a talented carpenter and began by sculpting little animal shapes when he was in secondary school.

Altai goes to work early in the morning and comes back at midnight due to his workload. When he comes home, a freezing cold house greets him. Thus, he is planning to insulate his home.

With this loan, Altai will fix the floor and roof of his house and make wall insulation using energy-saving materials. These changes will improve his living condition and stop the house from losing heat. As a result of these changes, he can save money that he now spends on heating and emit fewer of the hazardous chemicals generated by the coal-burning stove that warms the house.

loans.use: to insulate his house and fix the floor and roof.

loans.name: Paciencia

texts.en:
A married parent of three children, Paciencia works hard to support her family.

She has a shell crafting business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Paciencia is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF to buy materials for her shell crafting business.

Paciencia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her shell crafting business.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es: Luz Mary  es una mujer esforzada por sacar adelante a sus hijos, esmerada por ofrecerles siempre lo mejor. Padece de una enfermedad en los huesos, pero esto no ha sido motivo para seguir luchando para llevar a casa el sustento diario y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a su enfermedad ella no puede salir mucho de casa porque le duelen los pies, razón por la cual decidió montar en su hogar un negocio dedicado a la venta de comidas rápidas, mecatos y licor. Sus hijos le ayudan siempre que salen del colegio. Su mayor sueño es brindarle una buena educación a sus hijos y una mejor calidad de vida, razón por la cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin invertirlo en surtido y poder generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Luz Mary is a woman who works hard to get her children ahead and is conscientious about always giving them the best.  She suffers from a bone disease, but this hasn't kept her from striving to support her family every day and give them a better quality of life.

Her feet hurt her because of her illness, so she's not able to leave the house very much.  This is why she decided to set up a business in her home selling fast food, lunches, and liquor.  Her children help her when they get out of school.

Her biggest dream is to give her children a good education and a better quality of life, which is why she's asking for a loan to invest in supplies, to be able to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy fast-food and lunch supplies and liquor

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en: Magdalena, 48 years of age, is married and has five children. She has operated her retail store in their village for almost 15 years, and she earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month. She has requested a loan from Kiva lenders of 20,000 PHP to purchase grocery items to sell in her store. Magdalena is determined and patient to improve her business to supplement the needs of her family. Her profit will be used as additional working capital for her business.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items to sell in her retail store

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 59 years old, a widow with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Remedios has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years. She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business. In the future, Remedios would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Rosenda works hard to support her family.

She has an internet cafe business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from her manicure and general store businesses. Rosenda is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF to buy computer supplies for her internet cafe.

Rosenda has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy computer supplies for her internet cafe.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 33 years old, married and thankful for having two children. Her family is her motivational guide, and she works hard to give them a better quality of life by doing something that brings in additional income and allows her to support her children.

She has been running her general store for ten years. The daily net profits of 500 PHP are just enough to cover the cost of the family's daily meals. Thus, she is thankful for having other sources of income aside from retailing: she also has a boarding house for rent.

To improve her income in the store, Yolanda is requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase additional stock of items such as biscuits, soft drinks, cooking oil, sugar and other ingredients to resell. Yolanda says that the loan will be very helpful in the success of her businesses.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of items such as biscuits, soft drinks, cooking oil, sugar and other ingredients to resell.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 43 years old and married with six children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Susana has a shell crafts business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 17 years. Susana requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy raw materials for the business.

In the future, Susana would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her shell crafts business.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina es una mujer dedicada a sus hijos y a las labores del hogar, actividades que alterna con la administración de su tienda, la cual se encuentra ubicada en la sala de su casa. Todos los días sin falta abre su negocio de 7 de la mañana a 9 de la noche. “Mi negocio es una gran bendición gracias a él mis hijos han logrado estudiar el bachillerato y salir adelante” con estas palabras doña Luz nos cuenta lo importante que es para ella tener su tienda. En estos momentos se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido especialmente licor y mecatos para la temporada de fin de año, inversión que espera le deje buenas utilidades para ofrecerles a sus hijos un feliz navidad. Su mayor sueño es poder tener una mejor calidad y ofrecerles a sus hijos la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a woman who is dedicated to her children and the household chores, activities she balances with running the store she has in the living room of her house.  Every day without fail her business is open from 7 in the morning until 9 at night.  "My business is a big blessing.  Thanks to it my children have been able to get a degree and get ahead."  With these words Luz tells us how important her store is to her.

Currently she's requesting a loan to buy stock, especially liquor and packed lunches for the end-of-the year season.  She hopes the investment will give her good profits to give her children a happy Christmas.

Her biggest dream is to be able to have a better quality of life and give her children the opportunity to attend the university.

loans.use: to buy liquor and prepared lunches.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig roasting business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy more pigs for her business.

NWTF is presenting Zenaida's business for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family

loans.use: to buy more pigs for her pig roasting business.

loans.name: Miguel Fabian

texts.es: Miguel es un joven de 20 años de edad que tiene claro que es lo que quiere en la vida y como lograrlo. Terminó el bachiller hace dos años y como su familia no contaba con los ingresos para darle una carrera universitaria se dedicó al  aserrío de maderas produciendo tendidos para camas, teleras para la construcción, cajones para empacar frutas, estacas y estacones. Aprendió el oficio trabajando como ayudante en una carpintería y posteriormente inició con su propio negocio en un local que alquiló. Su mayor deseo es ingresar a la universidad y poderse graduar como un gran profesional. En estos momentos se encuentra solicitando un crédito para comprar madera por cantidad y reducir costos, con el fin de ahorrar dinero y poder comenzar con sus estudio universitario.
texts.en:
Miguel is 20-year-old young man who is clear about what he wants in life and how to get it. He finished high school two years ago and his family could not afford a university career.  He works making wood products for beds, pieces for construction, boxes to pack fruits, and stakes. 

He learned his trade working as an assistant in a carpentry store and later started his own business in a place that he rented. 

His biggest dream is to go to the university and graduate like a great professional. Currently he is asking for a loan to buy wood in large quantities to reduce costs, with the goal of saving money and be able to start his university education.

loans.use: to purchase wood

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is from the village of Minanga Proper. She is 56 years old and is married to Salvador, a farmer who helps her to manage their farm.

To make a living, she owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising crops. She’s been engaged in farming corn for over 20 years and earns approximately 30,000 PHP every crop season (every four months) from these activities.

She is now requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her corn production business. Future loans from Kiva would be invaluable to her as she sees the loans as the only opportunity for progression of her business and, thus, financial security.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her corn production business.

loans.name: Khuon

texts.en:
Khuon, 54, is a single mother of five children. She works to manage her farm, harvesting rice to sell in each harvest season. Her business location is not too far from her home in Prey Chor District of Kompong Cham Province. She says that the only business she learned from her parents is growing rice, and it’s the sole source of income she has to support her family. Khuon works hard and spends most of her day time taking care of her crops, especially in the rainy season. Four of her children always help her in the business.

Khuon is asking for a 1,200,000 riel loan to pay for the passport and document processing fees of her son, who is going to work in a neighboring country. With support from this loan, Khuon hopes that she can cover the costs and help her son accordingly. In the future, Khuon plans to purchase a few pieces of farmland to expand her rice production.

loans.use: to pay for passport and document processing fees for her son, who is going to work in a neighboring country.

loans.name: Alijon

texts.ru: Аличон 27 - летний женатый молодой человек, проживающий в районе Джиликул. У него среднее - специальное образование. Он хочет работать таксистом. Аличон берет кредит для приобретения легковой автомашины, чтобы начать свою деятельность. Он намерен предоставлять услугу по маршруту Душанбе-Вахдат.
texts.en: Alijon, age 27, is a young man who is married and lives in the Jilikul district.  He has a technical high school diploma and wants to work as a taxi driver.  He is taking a loan to purchase a car, which will allow him to start his activity.  He plans to provide taxi services between Dushanbe and Vahdat.

loans.use: to purchase a car.

loans.name: Mamat

texts.ru: Мамат проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Мамат намерен заняться своим бизнесом. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков, чтобы заняться разведением крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Mamat lives in the Shahrituz district.  He is 46 years old, married, and has three children.  He intends to start his own business.  He is taking a loan to buy young bulls in order to get involved in raising cattle.

loans.use: to buy young bulls.

loans.name: Saidoy

texts.ru: Саидой жительница города Турсунзаде. Она вдова. Ей 50 лет. У нее четверо детей. Саидой у себя дома намерена заняться своим бизнесом. Она берет кредит для закупа тканей и материалов, чтобы начать торговлю.
texts.en: Saidoy is a resident of the city of Tursunzoda.  She is 50 years old and a widow.  She has four children.  She is planning to start her own business and work from home.  She is taking a loan to buy cloth and fabrics, in order to get involved in retail business.

loans.use: to buy cloth and fabrics.

loans.name: María Fernanda

texts.es: María Fernanda tiene 22 años de edad y desde joven se ha dedicado a trabajar para comprar sus cosas personales y colaborar con los gastos del hogar. Comenzó laborando en un puesto de comidas rápidas de un amigo y posteriormente decidió independizarse y comenzó a vender productos Amway para la salud, belleza y hogar. Labora  todos los días recorriendo los barrios de Rionegro, Colombia ofreciendo su mercancía. Su proyecto a mediano plazo es montar un almacén para vender sus productos y combinarlo con la venta de ropa y accesorios. En la actualidad desea expandir la oferta de productos por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido en la temporada de fin de año. Su mayor deseo es convertirse en una microempresaria de éxito y poderle dar a su madre una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Fernanda, 22, has worked from a young age to buy her personal things and contribute to the household expenses.  She began working at a friend's fast-food business and later decided to go out on her own to sell health, beauty, and household products from Amway.  She works every day, selling her merchandise around the neighborhoods of Rionegro, Colombia.  Her medium-term goal is to set up a store to sell her products along with clothing and accessories.

Currently she wants to expand the products she sells, so she's requesting a loan to buy stock for the holiday season.

Her biggest desire is to become a successful micro-entrepreneur and be able to give her mother a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy Amway products

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.en:
Esperanza is 53 years old and a widow with six children.

Esperanza works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

Esperanza has been in this business for 5 years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Orlan

texts.en:
Orlan is 44 years old and is married. Hog-raising is the primary source of income of the family. He has been in this business for 1 year. He earns about PHP 2,500 per piglet every time he sells it. 

Orlan is asking a loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy feed and vaccine for his hogs. He hopes that he can avail the amount he requested, so that he will be able to sustain the needs of his hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccine for his hogs.

loans.name: Clemence

texts.en:
Clemence is 50 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for 21 years and also earns additional income from farming vegetables and general store businesses. 

Clemence is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, medicines, and vaccines for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines, and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Ariyalkham

texts.en:
Ariyalkham is 38 years old and lives with her husband and three children in a rented house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital. Her three children go to secondary schools. 

In 2009, Ariyalkham established a plaster and decoration company with her husband. Ariyalkham is responsible for finding orders and her husband implements the orders. If they have many jobs, they hire more people to meet their deadlines. Her business is going well since they established the company. Her family has been renting houses for the last 6 years. 

In 2011, Ariyalkham bought a 220-square-meter plot of land in the area of ger districts. Ariyalkham is planning to build her own house on their land next spring. So, she is asking for a loan of 5,400,000 MNT to purchase building materials like bricks, wood, and cement when the price of these materials are lowest. By doing this her family will have their own house, which will bring them happiness every single day. 

In the future, Ariyalkham plans to extend her house to make rental rooms for students because her land is located not far from downtown and near the paved road.

loans.use: to purchase building materials like bricks, wood, and cement.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Sakina is a 24-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. For five years, Sakina has been running a business of milk sales. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner. With the passage of time, her sales increased along with her income. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family and financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement that she got by sending both of her children to school. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of 20,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.en:
As a married mother of ten children, Amparo works hard to support her family.

She has a sari-sari store business in the Philippines. She earns additional income from selling fruits and vegetables and from a sugarcane farming business. Amparo is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy items like canned goods and other grocery items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Amparo has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods and other groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 36 years old and is married with five children. Three of her children are in school. Arlene works very hard to provide for them.

Arlene runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell to customers.

Arlene has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as bread, sugar, cooking oil and other miscellaneous items. 

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough to provide financial security for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell to customers.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 63 years old and married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Editha has a general store business in the Philippines. Editha requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and grocery items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Editha has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Editha would like to save enough to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy inventory like shampoo and grocery items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita is 59 years old and married with one child. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Julita runs a variety store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional grocery items to sell at her store.

Julita has borrowed and paid back 24 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for 15 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Julita aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items to sell at her store.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 42 years old and married with two children.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more canned goods, soft drinks and other groceries.

Josephine has borrowed and paid off 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years. She also earns an income from selling food.

Josephine aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more canned goods, soft-drinks and other groceries for her store.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy was born in 1953. She has four children who all have their own families. Her husband raises doves and his income is 3,000,000 VND. Thuy grows rice, raises pigs and is environmental cleaner to earn a living. She has done her job for 25 years. Her income is about 3,500,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,184,000 VND to buy food for pigs. She has always wanted to raise more pigs and earn more money for her family’s income.

loans.use: to buy food for pigs

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 43 years old and married with eight children. Five of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 
Liza has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.
Liza has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Liza would like to save enough money to provide financial security for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Narmandakh

texts.en: Narmandakh is 30 years old. He lives alone in his small wooden house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His parents live in the countryside. Narmandakh worked in Korea for seven years as a contract worker. Since 2011, he has run a taxi business in Mongolia. This year, Narmandakh has been building a house with 10 rooms in order to increase his income by renting to students who come from the countryside. The house is 80 percent complete. This loan will be used to complete his building. Narmandakh plans to install an electric heating system instead of a charcoal burning stove, and he plans to connect the house to the central sewer line. By doing this, he can cut the use of charcoal and protect the environment by preventing contamination from the outside toilet.

loans.use: to complete his house

loans.name: Kengele

texts.en: Kengele is a 48-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling hides and skin for a long time, and with the proceeds he has been able to venture into farming. He also operates as a butcher. He sells his products to Alpine Hides and Skin Uganda who offer attractive prices. Kengele hopes to expand his business and become a dealer despite challenges of raising the initial capital required by the company. Kengele intends to use the loan to buy hides and skin to sell.

loans.use: to buy hides and skin to sell

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is 75 years old and married with four children. Paulina works very hard to provide for them.
Paulina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of  PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.
Paulina has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sardines and noodles. 
In the future, Paulina would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy chicks and poultry feed for a poultry business

loans.name: Edita

texts.en: This time, for her 4th loan, Edita is borrowing PHP 14,000, with which she intends to buy grocery items for her store to sell.  The basket weaving and pig fattening businesses that she previously funded through NWTF continue to provide Edita and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.
